snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Knight - 1960s TV Series Batmobile Pack (Race Tracks & Free Roam Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Batman: Arkham Knight "Classic TV Series Batmobile Pack": Race Tracks, free roam gameplay, and classic skins for Catomwan and Robin -  Video available in Full HD (1080p)

The 1960s TV Series Batmobile can be used in free roam only once you've cleared the streets of the drones tanks. There's no Battle Mode for this Batmobile, that means you can't start missions that involve tank battles or use the car during the story.

OCTOBER DLC SHOWCASE:
0:00 - 1960s TV Series Batmobile Showcase
0:35 - AR Challenge: 1960s TV Series Batmobile Race Track - Penguin Dockyard (1 Lap Race)
1:57 - AR Challenge: 1960s TV Series Batmobile Race Track - Batcave Set (1 Lap Race)
3:30 - AR Challenge: 1960s TV Series Batmobile Race Track - Penguin Dockyard (3 Lap Race)
6:39 - AR Challenge: 1960s TV Series Batmobile Race Track - Batcave Set (3 Lap Race)
10:13 - 1960s TV Series Batmobile Gameplay in Free Roam
13:13 - Classic TV Series Robin Skin (Showcase and Gameplay)
14:47 - Classic TV Series Catwoman Skin (Showcase and Gameplay)

===================================

Game available on: Sony PlayStation 4, Microsoft Xbox One & PC
Video recorded on: Xbox One

===================================

Follow BatmanArkhamVideos on:
● YouTube - http://www.youtube.com/BatmanArkhamVideos
● Twitter- http://www.twitter.com/ArkhamVideos
● Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/BatmanArkhamNews

For more info and videos, visit http://www.Batman-Arkham.com and http://www.Games-Series.com
